name: Consume Traffic Data
desc: Google analytics allows you free access to anonymous data about your traffic collected by Google. The main benefit of data as a collection is the ability to study and understand the vague patterns your visitors generate as a group.

name: Booking Cycle Management
desc: Receive booking requests and manage them virtually, alongside your physical fulfilment process.

name: Listing Management
desc: Manage and update your virtual menu of services; service details (name, price, effectedBy, description etc).

name: Usage Summaries
desc: Your infrastructure usage is concantenated into a single view for quick glance summaries.
